name: WobblyKids
description:
Don't ask why he has a hat. A small experimental game made with unity which involves a character, a ball, and an extremely frustrating parkour course. Have fun smashing your desk to pieces when you get tricked by a fake floor! This is my first game in Unity so it's probably bad. Thanks for checking this out!

This is updated very often, around twice a day, so be sure to get the latest one.

Donations are greatly appreciated, and even more appreciated if you could donate exactly $0.69
